title: Pale Gray for Guilt
description: Tush Bannon was in the wrong spot at the wrong time. His measly plot of land just so happened to sit right in the middle of a rich parcel of five hundred riverfront acres that big-money real estate interests decided they simply must have.It didn’t matter that Tush was a nice guy with a family, or that he never knew he was dealing with a criminal element. They squashed him like a bug and walked away, counting their change. But one thing they never counted the gentle giant had a not-so-gentle friend in Travis McGee. And now he’s going to make them pay.
author: John D. MacDonald
